about_the_game:
DARK DAWN:The Chronicles of a Doll is a first-person game as an episodic experience where you are a kidnapping victim and you will have a realistic experience about all its most terrifying ends such as human trafficking, organ sales and the dark web. The game is an artistic protest about these crimes that are almost a taboo in video games. 

EPISODICAL

In the game you can advance through the story through 5 episodes, like a television series.

BIOLOGICAL CLOCK

You can adjust the schedule of the day and activate key moments in the story to continue advancing. A prolonged period of induced sleep can cause death.

CRAFTING

You can build things and level up to perfect your crafting techniques in order to survive.

HALLUCINATIONS

The powerful sedative will make you have terrible hallucinations during the game in distorted worlds completely removed from reality. Surviving your own mind will be complex. You could be in a toy store with animals and then it turns into a wild African savannah.

DEPRESSIVE MODE

If you don't take care of your mental state, you can panic and become a victim of your own suffering. Dark enemies will start harassing you until they finish you off.

Will you be able to escape this final nighmare?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Frequent violence or gore, general adult content
